trans-unit.source: Defines a rectangular hot spot region in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
This class cannot be inherited.
This class defines a rectangular hot spot region in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.

To define the region of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the rectangular region's top left corner.
Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the rectangular region's top left corner.
Set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> property to the value that represents the x-coordinate of the rectangular region's bottom right corner.
Set of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> property to the value that represents the y-coordinate of the rectangular region's bottom right corner.
When a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> control is clicked, the page navigates to a URL, generates a post back to the server, or does nothing.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property specifies this behavior.

To navigate to a URL, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate` and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to navigate to.

To post back to the server, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.PostBack` and use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property to specify a name for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
This name will be passed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> event data when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> is clicked.
If you want the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to have no behavior, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property to `HotSpotMode.Inactive`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> class.
Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> property allows you to get or set a value that represents the y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.

To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for the this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> properties.
The y-coordinate of the bottom side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
The default is 0.

Returns a string that represents the x -and y-coordinates of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object's top left corner and the x- and y-coordinates of its bottom right corner.
This method returns a string that represents the coordinates of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object's top left corner and the coordinates of its bottom right corner.

This method uses the values assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> properties to return the coordinates for the top left corner.

It uses the values assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties to return the coordinates for the bottom right corner.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.GetCoordinates%2A> method is used internally by ASP.NET to get the text to use for the coordinates of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> when it is rendered.
The string that is returned is specific to the browser and markup language.

A string that represents the x- and y-coordinates of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object's top left corner and the x- and y-coordinates of its bottom right corner.
Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the left side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A> property allows you to get or set a value that represents the x-coordinate of the left side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.

To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for the this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties.
The x-coordinate of the left side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
The default is 0.
Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the right side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A> property allows you to get or set a value that represents the x-coordinate of the right side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.

To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object, you must specify a value for this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties.
The x-coordinate of the right side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
The default is 0.
Gets or sets the y-coordinate of the top side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Top%2A> property allows you to get or set a value that represents the y-coordinate of the top side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.
To completely define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> object.

you must specify a value for this property and for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Left%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Right%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot.Bottom%2A> properties.
The y-coordinate of the top side of the rectangular region defined by this <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot"></xref> object.
The default is 0.
